00031 static inline unsigned
00032 hwloc_get_type_or_below_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00033 {
00034   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00035 
00036   if (depth != HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00037     return depth;
00038 
00039   /* find the highest existing level with type order >= */
00040   for(depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, HWLOC_OBJ_PROC); ; depth--)
00041     if (hwloc_compare_types(hwloc_get_depth_type(topology, depth), type) < 0)
00042       return depth+1;
00043 
00044   /* Shouldn't ever happen, as there is always a SYSTEM level with lower order and known depth.  */
00045   abort();
00046 }
00047 
00054 static inline unsigned
00055 hwloc_get_type_or_above_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00056 {
00057   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00058 
00059   if (depth != HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00060     return depth;
00061 
00062   /* find the lowest existing level with type order <= */
00063   for(depth = 0; ; depth++)
00064     if (hwloc_compare_types(hwloc_get_depth_type(topology, depth), type) > 0)
00065       return depth-1;
00066 
00067   /* Shouldn't ever happen, as there is always a PROC level with higher order and known depth.  */
00068   abort();
00069 }

00080 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00081 hwloc_get_system_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology)
00082 {
00083   return hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, 0, 0);
00084 }
00085 
00090 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00091 hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00092 {
00093   if (!prev)
00094     return hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00095   if (prev->depth != depth)
00096     return NULL;
00097   return prev->next_cousin;
00098 }
00099 
00106 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00107 hwloc_get_next_obj_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_type_t type,
00108                    hwloc_obj_t prev)
00109 {
00110   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00111   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00112     return NULL;
00113   return hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, prev);
00114 }
00115 
00120 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00121 hwloc_get_next_child (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t father, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00122 {
00123   if (!prev)
00124     return father->first_child;
00125   if (prev->father != father)
00126     return NULL;
00127   return prev->next_sibling;
00128 }
00129 
00131 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00132 hwloc_get_common_ancestor_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t obj1, hwloc_obj_t obj2)
00133 {
00134   while (obj1->depth > obj2->depth)
00135     obj1 = obj1->father;
00136   while (obj2->depth > obj1->depth)
00137     obj2 = obj2->father;
00138   while (obj1 != obj2) {
00139     obj1 = obj1->father;
00140     obj2 = obj2->father;
00141   }
00142   return obj1;
00143 }

00147 static inline int
00148 hwloc_obj_is_in_subtree (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t obj, hwloc_obj_t subtree_root)
00149 {
00150   return hwloc_cpuset_isincluded(obj->cpuset, subtree_root->cpuset);
00151 }

00165 extern int hwloc_get_largest_objs_inside_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00166                                                  hwloc_obj_t * restrict objs, int max);

00174 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00175 hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00176                                            unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00177 {
00178   hwloc_obj_t next = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, prev);
00179   while (next && !hwloc_cpuset_isincluded(next->cpuset, set))
00180     next = next->next_cousin;
00181   return next;
00182 }
00183 
00189 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00190 hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00191                                           hwloc_obj_type_t type, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00192 {
00193   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00194   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00195     return NULL;
00196   return hwloc_get_next_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth, prev);
00197 }
00198 
00201 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00202 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00203                                       unsigned depth, unsigned index)
00204 {
00205   int count = 0;
00206   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00207   while (obj) {
00208     if (hwloc_cpuset_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set)) {
00209       if (count == index)
00210         return obj;
00211       count++;
00212     }
00213     obj = obj->next_cousin;
00214   }
00215   return NULL;
00216 }
00217 
00223 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00224 hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00225                                      hwloc_obj_type_t type, unsigned index)
00226 {
00227   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00228   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00229     return NULL;
00230   return hwloc_get_obj_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth, index);
00231 }
00232 
00234 static inline unsigned
00235 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_depth (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00236                                          unsigned depth)
00237 {
00238   hwloc_obj_t obj = hwloc_get_obj_by_depth (topology, depth, 0);
00239   int count = 0;
00240   while (obj) {
00241     if (hwloc_cpuset_isincluded(obj->cpuset, set))
00242       count++;
00243     obj = obj->next_cousin;
00244   }
00245   return count;
00246 }
00247 
00253 static inline int
00254 hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_type (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00255                                         hwloc_obj_type_t type)
00256 {
00257   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00258   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN)
00259     return 0;
00260   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00261     return -1; /* FIXME: agregate nbobjs from different levels? */
00262   return hwloc_get_nbobjs_inside_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth);
00263 }
00264 
00277 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00278 hwloc_get_child_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00279                                 hwloc_obj_t father)
00280 {
00281   hwloc_obj_t child = father->first_child;
00282   while (child) {
00283     if (hwloc_cpuset_isincluded(set, child->cpuset))
00284       return child;
00285     child = child->next_sibling;
00286   }
00287   return NULL;
00288 }
00289 
00294 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00295 hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set)
00296 {
00297   struct hwloc_obj *current = hwloc_get_system_obj(topology);
00298 
00299   if (!hwloc_cpuset_isincluded(set, current->cpuset))
00300     return NULL;
00301 
00302   while (1) {
00303     hwloc_obj_t child = hwloc_get_child_covering_cpuset(topology, set, current);
00304     if (!child)
00305       return current;
00306     current = child;
00307   }
00308 }

00326 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00327 hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00328                                             unsigned depth, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00329 {
00330   hwloc_obj_t next = hwloc_get_next_obj_by_depth(topology, depth, prev);
00331   while (next && !hwloc_cpuset_intersects(set, next->cpuset))
00332     next = next->next_cousin;
00333   return next;
00334 }

00347 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00348 hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_type(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set,
00349                                            hwloc_obj_type_t type, hwloc_obj_t prev)
00350 {
00351   int depth = hwloc_get_type_depth(topology, type);
00352   if (depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_UNKNOWN || depth == HWLOC_TYPE_DEPTH_MULTIPLE)
00353     return NULL;
00354   return hwloc_get_next_obj_covering_cpuset_by_depth(topology, set, depth, prev);
00355 }

00369 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00370 hwloc_get_cache_covering_cpuset (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_cpuset_t set)
00371 {
00372   hwloc_obj_t current = hwloc_get_obj_covering_cpuset(topology, set);
00373   while (current) {
00374     if (current->type == HWLOC_OBJ_CACHE)
00375       return current;
00376     current = current->father;
00377   }
00378   return NULL;
00379 }
00380 
00385 static inline hwloc_obj_t
00386 hwloc_get_cache_covering_obj (hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t obj)
00387 {
00388   hwloc_obj_t current = obj->father;
00389   while (current) {
00390     if (!hwloc_cpuset_isequal(current->cpuset, obj->cpuset)
00391         && current->type == HWLOC_OBJ_CACHE)
00392       return current;
00393     current = current->father;
00394   }
00395   return NULL;
00396 }

00436 static inline void
00437 hwloc_distribute(hwloc_topology_t topology, hwloc_obj_t root, hwloc_cpuset_t *cpuset, int n)
00438 {
00439   int i;
00440   int chunk_size, complete_chunks;
00441   hwloc_cpuset_t *cpusetp;
00442 
00443   if (!root->arity || n == 1) {
00444     /* Got to the bottom, we can't split any more, put everything there.  */
00445     for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00446       cpuset[i] = hwloc_cpuset_dup(root->cpuset);
00447     return;
00448   }
00449 
00450   /* Divide n in root->arity chunks.  */
00451   chunk_size = (n + root->arity - 1) / root->arity;
00452   complete_chunks = n % root->arity;
00453   if (!complete_chunks)
00454     complete_chunks = root->arity;
00455 
00456   /* Allocate complete chunks first.  */
00457   for (cpusetp = cpuset, i = 0;
00458        i < complete_chunks;
00459        i ++, cpusetp += chunk_size)
00460     hwloc_distribute(topology, root->children[i], cpusetp, chunk_size);
00461 
00462   /* Now allocate not-so-complete chunks.  */
00463   for ( ;
00464        i < root->arity;
00465        i++, cpusetp += chunk_size-1)
00466     hwloc_distribute(topology, root->children[i], cpusetp, chunk_size-1);
00467 }
